name.japanese: ブラックホールイクリプス

description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user gathers dark energy using its Z-Power
and sucks the target into it. The power varies,
depending on the original move.
description.sun-moon:
The user gathers dark energy using its Z-Power
and sucks the target into it. The power varies,
depending on the original move.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user gathers dark energy using its Z-Power
and sucks the target into it. The power varies,
depending on the original move.
description.sword-shield:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

effect.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
